Use each verb below at least once: discover, state, prove.
The Pythagorean Theorem has incredible significance in every mathematical discipline, in particular geometry and algebra, that deal with shapes on flat and abstract surfaces respectively The equation, when presented visually alongside its respective geometry application, serves not only to educate one on how best measure linear side and diagonal lengths of varying polygon types but even uncovers deeper secrets surrounding those quantities The mathematical truth can also be stated symbolically as follows : c (squared ) always equals 0 when paired with either (b) or (a). For right triangle where (a)-leg -and -b-, -c- represent their combined length squares For example when (is five by four squared ), they match perfectly Thus any proof for this theorem's authenticity remains paramount To wit the Greek mathematician's insightfulness concerning geometric concepts such measurement remains undoubtedly pivotal Therefore mastering the proper proof methods underlies this theory
